channel.title: Infinity Dynamic Inventory Slot
channel.description:
Hey!
I used this mod when I removed parts of like 3 big factorys, when I was done, I put all to the sink. Then i stopped the game, and removed the mod. Now I have SUPER big inventory even in vanilla.. Any suggestions?
Tried install the mod again, and have a empty inventory, but no spaces got erased. :frowning:

item.title: Infinity Dynamic Inventory Slot
item.dc:creator: @JamieRCHI Jamie
item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

Edit: It looks like others are having problems with this mod. It has been awhile that I have seen any response from mod writers. I think they expect us to use Discord to contact them.

Read full topic
